open_spaces_details.description: Amenity is provided to the warehouse with the application for a roof terrace, sedum roof and solar PV panels mounted onto the existing roof structure

description: Construction of roof terrace with screening, new green roof; retention of Solar Panels to rear roof and new ground floor rear window
subdivision_of_building: Rootop location to rear of main building
application_type_full: Full planning & demolition in a conservation area
decision_conditions:
The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this permission.


REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

The Development hereby permitted shall only be carried out and completed strictly in accordance with the submitted plans hereby approved and any subsequent approval of details.


REASON: To ensure that the development hereby permitted is carried out in full accordance with the plans hereby approved.

<p><span id="docs-internal-guid-3d2e2042-7fff-0f02-2320-8dc8438acbda"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;text-align: justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span id="docs-internal-guid-adde2111-7fff-cb7f-b31e-46dbf5d5f66a"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:#ffffff;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">Detailed drawings/full particulars of the proposed development showing the matters set out below must be submitted to and approved by the local planning authority, in writing, before the relevant work begins. The development shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the details thus approved.</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:#ffffff;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;"><br></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:#ffffff;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">Details of solar panels</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:#ffffff;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;"><br></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:#ffffff;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;"><span id="docs-internal-guid-2c365463-7fff-800b-2892-d2f51e2c83ba"></span></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;text-align: justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:#ffffff;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: </span><span style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; white-space-collapse: preserve;">To ensure that the external appearance of the building is satisfactory and does not detract from the character and visual amenity of the area.</span></p><div><span style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; white-space-collapse: preserve;"><br></span></div>

<p>The roof terrace, hereby approved, shall only be used between the hours of 10:00 and 18:00 Mondays to Fridays, and shall not be used on Saturdays and Sundays or Bank Holidays.&nbsp;</p><p>Reason:&nbsp; To ensure that adjoining neighbours are safeguarded from noise and disturbance.</p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;background-color:#ffffff;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">Prior to the use of the roof as a terrace, full details, and photo samples naming the materials to be used for the screens on the roof terrace, shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority, in writing. The development shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the details thus approved.&nbsp;</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.44;background-color:#ffffff;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><br></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;background-color:#ffffff;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: To ensure that the external appearance of the building is satisfactory and does not detract from the character and visual amenity of the area and that residential amenities are protected</span><span style="font-size:12pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">.</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-243ca664-7fff-420b-bab9-657044180732"><br></span></p>

<p>Prior to occupation of the development,&nbsp;hereby approved, full details of the following, including installation certificates by MSC registered installer, must be submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority:-(i) Proposed solar PV panels annual electricity peak generation. The development shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the details thereby approved.</p><p>REASON: In the interest of addressing climate change and securing sustainable and net zero development and construction, in accordance with LP55 of the Hackney Local Plan, SI2 of the London Plan, and Section 14 of the National Planning Policy Framework and in the interests of the visual amenities of the area.&nbsp;</p>

<p><span id="docs-internal-guid-ee325d9a-7fff-97c5-1916-45f8d34f9b22"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">Prior to commencement of development a Dust Management Plan to include details of how dust from construction activity will be </span><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">controlled mitigated and suppressed following best practice guidance shall be submitted to and approved by the local planning authority in writing. </span></span><span style="background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; white-space-collapse: preserve;">Details shall include a barrier shall be constructed around the site, and a wheel washing facility shall be installed and operated to ensure that dust/debris is not carried onto the road by vehicles exiting the site. The development shall be implemented in accordance with these details.</span></p><p><br></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-248a16bb-7fff-12b9-2d9d-3d40287019a5"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">REASON: To protect air quality and people’s health by ensuring that the production of air pollutants, such as nitrogen dioxide and particulate matter, are kept to a minimum during the course of building works.</span><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(255, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;"> </span></span><span style="background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt; white-space-collapse: preserve;"><br></span></p>

<p><span id="docs-internal-guid-2518370e-7fff-c0c5-e6bc-5efa1da85fa0"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">Full details of a green roof,&nbsp; to include a section through the substrate at 1:20 and a detailed maintenance plan, shall be submitted to and approved by the local planning authority, in writing, before the relevant work  commences. The development shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the details thus approved and shall be fully implemented before the premises are first occupied.</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline;"><br></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline;"><span id="docs-internal-guid-91087749-7fff-bb9e-683c-d55a3844f992" style=""><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">REASON: To enhance the character and ecology of the development, to provide undisturbed refuges for wildlife, to promote sustainable urban drainage, and to enhance the performance and efficiency of the proposed building.</span></span><br></span></p>

<p>The roof terrace, hereby approved, shall only be used in connection with the existing commercial unit <span style="font-family: Arial; white-space-collapse: preserve;">and shall </span><span style="font-family: Arial; white-space-collapse: preserve; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">not be hired out for public use or used for any other purposes.</span></p><p>Reason: To ensure development is appropriate and does not impact on the amenities of the surrounding area.</p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:10pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">No playing of amplified music and/or use of a microphone shall take place whilst using the roof terrace. &nbsp;</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-43904aa1-7fff-b656-22ad-f7ec01dfa846"><br><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">REASON: To ensure that occupiers of neighbouring premises do not suffer a loss of amenity by reason of noise nuisance and other excess noise</span><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">.</span></span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">The total noise level from the roof terrace shall be 10 dB(A) or more below the measured LA90 level at the nearest noise sensitive premises at any time in line with BS4142:2014 industrial noise affecting mixed residential and industrial areas'.&nbsp;</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-947d05a4-7fff-a1a9-5453-282dc478c2d6"><br></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: To ensure that occupiers of neighbouring premises do not suffer a loss of amenity by reason of noise nuisance and other excess noise.</span></p>
